name: Project Brooklyn
description:
PROJECT BROOKLYN

A very short prototype game jam thing made for the GMI Community Game Jam.

In it you take control of Captain America as he runs through the western front during World War 2. Your goal is ultimately to give Hitler the ol' knuckle sandwich!

Controls:

CTRL to raise your trusty shield
SPACE to jump

Made with Unity, using Visual Scripting (Bolt) and Aseprite for pixel art. A fun little project and I learned a bunch of new things, but ultimately there was no time to finish it, make sounds or make it more juicier or anything... maybe one day.
